C

cancel() - Method in interface com.visionspace.taskmanager.TaskHandle
Cancels this task; if the task is queued, it will never be executed; if it is running, the running thread will be interrupted, and as long as it handles interrupts the task finishes.
cancelledTaskInfo(TaskStateInfo) - Static method in class com.visionspace.taskmanager.TaskStateInfo
Creates the state for a task that transitions to the TaskState.FAILED state from a given state as a consequence of a task being explicitly cancelled.
cancelTask(String) - Method in class com.visionspace.taskmanager.impl.store.InMemoryTaskStore
 
cancelTask(String) - Method in interface com.visionspace.taskmanager.impl.store.TaskStore
Makes the state change for when a task is cancelled, i.e., state changes to TaskState.FAILED and TaskStateInfo.wasCancelled() set to true.
claimTask(String) - Method in class com.visionspace.taskmanager.impl.store.InMemoryTaskStore
 
claimTask(String) - Method in interface com.visionspace.taskmanager.impl.store.TaskStore
Claims a task in an atomic operation, changing the task from the TaskState.QUEUED state to the TaskState.RUNNING state if the claim operation succeeds.
close() - Method in class com.visionspace.taskmanager.impl.store.InMemoryTaskStore
 
close() - Method in interface com.visionspace.taskmanager.impl.store.TaskStore
Releases resources used by the task store.
close(long, TimeUnit) - Method in class com.visionspace.taskmanager.impl.launcher.TaskLauncher
Closes this launcher by cancelling any running tasks and stopping listening for new tasks.
com.visionspace.taskmanager - package com.visionspace.taskmanager
Task Manager public API.
com.visionspace.taskmanager.descriptor - package com.visionspace.taskmanager.descriptor
Implementations of the TaskDescriptor interface, part of the public API.
com.visionspace.taskmanager.impl.launcher - package com.visionspace.taskmanager.impl.launcher
Implementation of the TaskLauncher architecture component.
com.visionspace.taskmanager.impl.manager - package com.visionspace.taskmanager.impl.manager
Implementation of the TaskManager architecture component.
com.visionspace.taskmanager.impl.store - package com.visionspace.taskmanager.impl.store
Implementation of the TaskStore architecture component.
createDistributedTaskManager(int) - Method in class com.visionspace.taskmanager.TaskManagerFactory
Creates a distributed task manager TaskManager, i.e., one where tasks are persisted in external storage and that allows for task manager restarts.
createLocalTaskManager(int) - Method in class com.visionspace.taskmanager.TaskManagerFactory
Creates a TaskManager where submitted tasks run on the local JVM and where task state is not persisted across task manager executions.
createRunnableTask() - Method in class com.visionspace.taskmanager.descriptor.ExplicitTaskDescriptor
 
createRunnableTask() - Method in class com.visionspace.taskmanager.descriptor.ReflectionTaskDescriptor
 
createRunnableTask() - Method in interface com.visionspace.taskmanager.TaskDescriptor
Instantiates a RunnableTask that is responsible for the task behavior.
createSingleThreadedTaskManager() - Method in class com.visionspace.taskmanager.LocalTaskManagerTest
 
createSingleThreadedTaskManager() - Method in class com.visionspace.taskmanager.TaskManagerTest
Creates a task manager that is able to run only a task at a time.
createTask(TaskDescriptor, long) - Method in class com.visionspace.taskmanager.impl.store.InMemoryTaskStore
 
createTask(TaskDescriptor, long) - Method in interface com.visionspace.taskmanager.impl.store.TaskStore
Creates a task.
createTaskManager() - Method in class com.visionspace.taskmanager.LocalTaskManagerTest
 
createTaskManager() - Method in class com.visionspace.taskmanager.TaskManagerTest
Creates the default task manager to use in tests.
